birth_context.metadata: 1920s: Athens felt interwar modernization, mass culture, and uneven prosperity alongside integration and welfareâ€‘state recalibration; locals commonly emphasized frugality or new consumer tastes, family obligation, and neighborhood reciprocity and civic rules, unions, and cultural heritage pride.

formative_context.metadata: 1920s: Los Angeles felt interwar modernization, mass culture, and uneven prosperity alongside suburban expansion and consumer culture; locals commonly emphasized frugality or new consumer tastes, family obligation, and neighborhood reciprocity and volunteerism and individual achievement.

1970s: Sydney felt oil shocks, stagflation or state expansion, and social realignment alongside stable democracies with multicultural inflows; locals commonly emphasized pragmatism, extended family safety nets, and informal hustles and sporting camaraderie and egalitarian manners.

current_socio_demographics.societal_perceptions: as a middle-aged immigrant in SE Asia, expected to work tirelessly but stigmatized for seeking mental health support

presenting_problem.summary: chronic depression with existential crisis after career disruption
